reqs:
Pre-reqs: (A cumulative average of 75% over at least 90 credits attempted in the first three years of a student's program and a minimum mark of 75% in CAPS 301 or PHYL 301 or its equivalent. Permission of the course director is also required.)
The class will take place in LSC 1416
description: The control and integration of cardio-pulmonary function in mammals. Intended for Honours students in Cellular, Anatomical and Physiological Sciences or other life sciences.
